word:
SISTER PECK: WE HAVE THREE CLASSES IN READING. THE YOUNGEST CLASS USES A LITTLE BIBLE READER THAT PROFESSOR SUTHERLAND GOT OUT. I DON'T KNOW WHETHER YOU REMEMBER IT. ANOTHER CLASS USES A BOOK THAT PROFESSOR BELL HAS PREPARED; AND ANOTHER CLASS ARE USING "MOUNT OF BLESSING" THIS YEAR. 


                                    -371-
